sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as string,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as string,
		ReorderPoint as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as string,
		ModelName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(input(
		HUB_Product_HK as long,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		ModelName as string,
		SAT_Product_HDIFF as long,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
